text: Stones in the Sun is a 2012 Haitian American drama movie directed by Patricia Benoit and starring Edwidge Danticat, Michele Marcelin, Diana Masi, Thierry Saintine, Patricia Rhinvil, James Noel, Carlo Mitton. == Other websites == * Category:2012 drama movies Category:Haitian movies Category:American drama movies
title: Stones in the Sun
